text: When you think Real Housewives of New York City, you think Sonja Morgan. And after you think Sonja, you probably picture her, glass of wine in hand, the life of the party. That was exactly the setting in which I met her at the opening of the new TMPL gym location. Morgan, dressed in head - to - toe sequins, was the center of attention, people hanging on her every word. Luckily, I was able to steal her away for a few minutes to talk her holiday favorites, the new season of RHONY, and which co - star would get coal from her this year.
